info.Tips_txt: Your source for uncommon, rare, ultra rare and genetically-enhanced flowers.

info.InventoryTips_txt: You don't have any seeds in inventory.

info.golab_txt: Here are 3 Free Spins courtesy of yours truly! Shhh.. don’t tell anyone!

info.cool_txt: My job is to create new flowers! You can get the seeds from the laboratory’s Seed Dispenser.

info.doc_txt: Greetings, I’m Dr. Cricket! I’m a scientist at the world-renowned Flower Shop Laboratory.

info.content_txt: Live your dream of owning your own Dessert Shop and use different bakings styles to create a myriad of scrumptious desserts.

info.flowerMake_hint_txt: You have no flowers in storage$Please plant and harvest more.

info.machineFruit_hint: You have no products in storage$Please produce more.

info.noart_hint: You have no floral products in storage$Please make more.

info.Tips_txt: Tip: Make floral products at the floral table, then sell them to earn Sapphires

info.tips_txt: Listen to enrapturing tales, participate in events and find mystery rewards. Enter the Carnival and test your skills!

info.tfPersonTips2: Please claim all rewards before the last day of the event or you will lose the chance to claim them.
info.tfGoldTitle: Based on the total amount of Gold you spend during the event period, you will be able to claim the following rewards:
info.tfGoldTips1: Note: Gold Rewards can only be claimed once each.
info.tfGoldTips2: Please claim all rewards before the last day of the event or you will lose the chance to claim them.

info.tfAcceptComp2Des3: 1. Leaderboard rewards will only be sent to the winners at the end of each round.
info.tfAcceptComp2Des5: All issues will be resolved at the end of the event.
info.tfSuperTaskDes5: Please claim all rewards before the last day of the event or you will lose the chance to claim them.
info.tfRankingDes3: Rewards will be sent to all winners after each round ends.
info.tfRankingDes4: Displayed Level leaderboard is based on your current level.
info.levelTip_txt: Casing not reached Lv.20, unfortunately you could not participate in this peer. Hurry up, more fantastic events are waiting!
info.tfMachineRewardDes3: You won the rewards of leaderboard!
info.tfMainDes: Leaderboards refresh every 2 minutes. Claim rewards after each round. You must be level 20 or above to enter leaderboard competitions.

info.tips_txt1: I'd love to go and do some outside activities but its too cold!

info.tips_txt2: Do you have any ways of keeping your shop warm during the winter?

info.tips_txt3: What about a fountain for your yard? Or maybe a reindeer for your shop?

info.tips_txt4: Let's get your shop prepared for winter!

info.des_txt: Early unlock and upgrade your shop to get more orders!

info.tips2_txt: Tips:You need friends' help to upgrade the shop unlocking.

info.des_txt: Materials are ready! Invite friends to help you upgrade!

info.desc_txt: One mysterious gift in each treasure box, try your luck to get the golden key!

info.condition_txt: Complete the Sincere Love timed tasks to earn Chasing Moto

info.condition_txt2: Good job! You earned Chasing Moto!
